unnormalised: Mogan tumi chain rule bhaxen anik kitin-i complex functions ani niyamank dhorun chala. Mhajeacher visvas theva, composite functions samballtanachem chain rule tumcho ut'tom ixtt zatlo. Udharonnak, d/dx (sin(x^3)) haka chain ruleachi goroz asta. Toxench, maxima ani minima hanchi ganit korchea khatir derivatives-anchi application tumkam kollonk zai. Hantun real-world application porikarcha prosn asta, udahoronnak, volume vaddouchea khatir ek pettichem sarvonkrusht dimenson sodun kaddop.
normalised: Magir tumi chain rule bhaxen odik gunthgunt'tichem functions ani niyamancher poddtat. Visvas theva, composite functions sobat deal kortana chain rule tumcho ut'tom ixtt. Hantunt khorea sonvsarantlea application prakarcheo problem'anchi bhov sankhya asta, udahoronnak, volume vaddo korche khatir eka box-achem ut'tom dimension sodhun kadop.
